imdb.plot outline: Bharyamani, the name itself suggests that it is the story of a woman, which revolves around a wife within a family. The lead character(Sameera Sherief) was a daughter of the millionaire and being rich she never knew the other way of poor life. She comes across a man(Seethakanth) whom she falls in love with later. The man was from a deprived middle-class family whose father was paralyzed. He leads the family with his low income. He had a sister for whom he is struggling hard to gather money to settle the dowry for her marriage. His nature and attitude of being responsible attracted her and she decides to marry him. But he refuses her offer as he is from a poor background. The girl will be in dilemma about her marriage. Meanwhile, her father is supposed to marry her and he chooses a man for her and makes the preparations for their marriage. The plot goes on to show how she decides her life, which way she chooses and what are the later consequences. The serial has succeeded in gaining the good response from the audience with progressive talk about the serial and which led to gain good TRP ratings for the show.
imdb.title: Bharyamani
plot: _Bharyamani_ (qv), the name itself suggests that it is the story of a woman, which revolves around a wife within a family. The lead character(Sameera Sherief) was a daughter of the millionaire and being rich she never knew the other way of poor life. She comes across a man(Seethakanth) whom she falls in love with later. The man was from a deprived middle-class family whose father was paralyzed. He leads the family with his low income. He had a sister for whom he is struggling hard to gather money to settle the dowry for her marriage. His nature and attitude of being responsible attracted her and she decides to marry him. But he refuses her offer as he is from a poor background. The girl will be in dilemma about her marriage. Meanwhile, her father is supposed to marry her and he chooses a man for her and makes the preparations for their marriage. The plot goes on to show how she decides her life, which way she chooses and what are the later consequences. The serial has succeeded in gaining the good response from the audience with progressive talk about the serial and which led to gain good TRP ratings for the show.::Cherrie
